item.title: Report E-2025040033
item.description:
Report E-2025040033

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-28
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 28, 2025, one (1) 2.5-gallon pail of UN1267 was punctured and released approximately one and a half (1.5) gallons of product to the trailer interior and dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Services, Inc. (ESI) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the impacted areas. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.
